amendment.description: to make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $10,000,000 for Combat Vehicle and Automotive Technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4840 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4840 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8703-8705) to make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $10,000,000 for Combat Vehicle and Automotive Technology.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4840 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4840 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
